Class Topic

java.lang.Object
  ncl.team22.languagetutor.data.Topic
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Topic
extends Object
implements Serializable

Provides topic structure and useful methods for getting information and data regarding topics from the database, as well as overriding toString

ben, james
